title: Mailbox Setting
answer:
1Adding Email Accounts 

 Enter the home menu > Email. The login account consists of manual setting and auto setting. 

 - Manual setup: 

2Account Settings interface > Enter the account number and password. 

3Click Manual setup. 

4Click POP3 to enter the incoming server-setting interface. 

5Click Next to enter the outgoing server-setting interface. 

6Click Next to enter the Email reception-setting screen, and select the Inbox check frequency. 

7Click Next to enter the Email interface and create a name and your name for the account. 

8Click Next to complete the login and enter the Inbox interface. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109990) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109991)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109992) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109993)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109994) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109995)

 - Auto Setting (Auto Setting requires parameters of the Email of this type to be set in the phone): 

 1. Account Settings interface > Input the account number and password. 

 2. Click Next. 

 3. Click Next to enter the Email reception-setting screen, and select the Inbox check frequency. 

 4. Click Next to enter the Email interface and create a name and your name for the account. 

 5. Click Next to complete the login and enter the inbox interface. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109996) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109997)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109998)

 For non-preset Email accounts and the setting of the login process, users can log in to the Email service provider's website to search. 

6Sending Emails 

 In the Inbox screen, click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109999) to enter the Write Email interface, edit the Recipient, Subject, Content, and then click Send Email. 

7View and delete Email 

 In the Inbox interface, click mail to view the message; Click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110000) to delete the message. 

8Delete Email Account 

 Enter Email, click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110001) > Settings, click the account you want to delete, and slide to the bottom to select Delete account.
